popt4jlib

Class ReentrantFunctionBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.ReentrantFunctionBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, FunctionIntf

    public class ReentrantFunctionBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements FunctionIntf
    The class is a wrapper class for FunctionIntf objects, that keeps track of how many times a function has been evaluated, plus it forces threads asking for function evaluation to execute sequentially.

    Notes:

    • 20190701: modified eval() to return Double.MAX_VALUE when the underlying function returns NaN.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReentrantFunctionBase(FunctionIntf f)
      public constructor, setting up the evaluation count to zero, maintaining a reference to the function passed in as the argument.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double eval(java.lang.Object arg, java.util.HashMap params)
      force function to be reentrant as no two threads can enter the eval() method simultaneously
      long getEvalCount()
      get the total number of times the eval(arg,params) method was called so far.
